mapper.delete: delete from DEMO_SYS_RESOURCE where RESOURCE_ID=#{resourceId} OR PARENT_ID=#{resourceId}
mapper.select: select t.resource_id, t.resource_name, t.parent_id, t.resource_url, t.target, t.icon, t.display_order, t.resource_type, t.description, (select count(*) from DEMO_sys_resource where parent_id = t.resource_id) cnt from DEMO_sys_resource t where resource_type=#{resourceType} order by display_order

select t.resource_id, t.resource_name, t.parent_id, t.resource_url, t.target, t.icon, t.display_order, t.resource_type, t.description, (select resource_name from DEMO_sys_resource where resource_id = t.parent_id) parent_name from DEMO_sys_resource t where RESOURCE_ID = #{resourceId}
